docpxTokens¶

Tokens

A stack of the parsed tokens converted to docpx Tokens from PHP source.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct($file)¶

Parses a PHP file into tokens which then are parsed into a stack of node objects.

Parameters:$file (string) – PHP Source file to parse.

count¶

count()

Returns a count of the total number of token nodes.

Return type:integer Number of token nodes in the node stack

current¶

current()

Returns the current item.

Return type:mixed The current item.

key¶

key()

Returns the key of the current element.

Return type:scalar Key of the current array position.

valid¶

valid()

Checks if current position is valid

Return type:boolean True if valid | False otherwise.

rewind¶

rewind()

Rewinds the iterator to the first element

Return type:mixed The current element after rewind.

next¶

next()

Moves forward to the next element

Return type:mixed The current element after next.

prev¶

prev()

Moves backward to the previous item. If already at the first item, moves to the last one.

Return type:mixed The current item after moving.
